item.title: Two T1 Lines For The Price of One
item.description:
Companies are transmitting more data than ever before, putting a strain on their WAN connections. You might assume that increasing bandwidth in this economic climate would be difficult, but what if you could get double the capacity for the same price? While it sounds unbelievable, many competing providers offer deals that effectively give you two T1 lines for the price of one. Skeptical? Compare current T1 prices to what you might have paid a few years ago on a multi-year contract, especially in major cities...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/two-t1-lines-for-the-price-of-one/
